choices.B: Modify the users roles on the User Management page
choices.C: Ensure the hosts are in a group and assign that group to a custom Prevention policy
choices.D: Create a new policy and assign it directly to those hosts on the Prevention policy page
choices.A: Create a new policy and assign it directly to those hosts on the Host Management page

questions.question_text: You have been provided with a list of 100 hashes that are not malicious but your company has deemed to be inappropriate for work computers. They have asked you to ensure that they are not allowed to run in your environment. You have chosen to use Falcon to do this. Which is the best way to accomplish this?

choices.B: Using Custom Alerts in the Investigate App, create a new alert using the template "Process Execution" and within that rule, select the option to "Block Execution"
choices.A: Using the Support Portal, create a support ticket and include the list of binary hashes, asking support to create an "Execution Prevention" rule to prevent these processes from running
choices.D: Using the API, gather the list of SHA256 or MD5 hashes for each binary and then upload them, setting them all to "Never Allow"
choices.C: Using IOC Management, gather the list of SHA256 or MD5 hashes for each binary and then upload them. Set all hashes to "Block" and ensure that the prevention policy these computers are using includes the option for "Custom Blocking" under Execution Blocking.

questions.question_text: When a host is placed in Network Containment, which of the following is TRUE?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer.

choices.C: The host machine is unable to send or receive any network traffic
choices.B: The host machine is unable to send or receive network traffic except to/from the Falcon Cloud and traffic allowed in the Firewall Policy
choices.D: The host machine is unable to send or receive network traffic except to/from the Falcon Cloud and any resources allowlisted in the Containment Policy
choices.A: The host machine is unable to send or receive network traffic outside of the local network

questions.question_text: When would the No Action option be assigned to a hash in IOC Management?

choices.C: There is no such option as No Action available in the Falcon console
choices.D: Add the indicator to your blocklist and show it as a detection
choices.A: When you want to save the indicator for later action, but do not want to block or allow it at this time
choices.B: Add the indicator to your allowlist and do not detect it
